scripts.smoke: npm run prepare-reports && cross-env k6 run --env TEST_TYPE=smoke src/main.js --out json=reports/smoke-result.json
scripts.load: npm run prepare-reports && cross-env k6 run --env TEST_TYPE=load src/main.js --out json=reports/load-result.json
scripts.spike: npm run prepare-reports && cross-env k6 run --env TEST_TYPE=spike src/main.js --out json=reports/spike-result.json
scripts.stress: npm run prepare-reports && cross-env k6 run --env TEST_TYPE=stress src/main.js --out json=reports/stress-result.json
